Tasks.Task Description: Identify the specific goals and outcomes for the AI project, including the problems to be solved and the expected benefits.
Determine the data sources needed for the AI models, including data types, volume, and quality requirements.
Research and select appropriate AI models that align with the project objectives and data characteristics.

Tasks.Task: Set Up Azure AI Studio Environment
Tasks.Task Description: Create an Azure AI Studio workspace and configure the necessary resources, including compute instances and storage accounts.
Implement data ingestion pipelines to bring data into the Azure AI Studio environment from various sources.
Clean and preprocess the ingested data to ensure it is suitable for training AI models, including handling missing values and normalization.
Utilize the selected AI models to train on the preprocessed data, adjusting parameters as necessary to optimize performance.
Assess the performance of the trained models using appropriate metrics and validation techniques to ensure they meet project objectives.
Deploy the trained models to production environments, ensuring they are accessible for inference and integrated with applications as needed.
Apply security best practices, including data encryption, access controls, and compliance with data protection regulations.

Set up monitoring for deployed models to track performance, detect anomalies, and ensure they continue to meet business requirements. Continuously monitor the performance of deployed AI models using Azure Monitor. Identify any performance degradation or anomalies in predictions.
Create comprehensive documentation of the project, including objectives, methodologies, data sources, and model performance metrics.
Organize training sessions for stakeholders and users to familiarize them with the AI models and how to utilize them effectively.
Regularly review the AI models and project outcomes, making necessary adjustments and improvements based on feedback and performance data.
Regularly update AI models with new training data and improved algorithms. Ensure that versioning is properly managed to maintain model integrity.
Schedule and execute retraining of AI models based on new data or performance metrics. Ensure that retraining processes are documented and validated.
Regularly assess the quality of data used for training AI models. Implement data cleansing processes to ensure high-quality input data.
Conduct audits to ensure AI models comply with relevant regulations and ethical guidelines. Document findings and implement necessary changes.
Regularly back up model artifacts, including training scripts, datasets, and model binaries. Ensure secure storage and easy retrieval for disaster recovery.
Collect feedback from users regarding the performance and usability of AI models. Use this feedback to inform future improvements and updates.
Keep all documentation related to AI models, including architecture, training processes, and performance metrics, up-to-date.
Perform regular security reviews of AI models and data pipelines to identify vulnerabilities and ensure compliance with security policies.
Develop and execute plans for scaling AI models based on usage patterns and performance metrics. Ensure minimal disruption during scaling activities.
